特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes will be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the coronavirus situation, and the pace of the course.

General course format:
Focus on content, academic skills and language skills. Also, focus on tasks, group work, paragraph and essay writing, presentations. Students will be expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

第14回: Week 14: Final project and course reflections
